titles.title: Help Organ Procurement Expand Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against gross income for organ donation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/10/2000--Introduced. Help Organ Procurement Expand Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $2,500 tax credit for qualified organ donations.
